dialog.confirmexit:
Are you sure you want to go?

Exiting this mode while printing will cancel all your jobs. Click OK to leave.

action.parktitle: Move the carriage back to the home position.
action.disabletitle: Raise and unlock stepper motors so that you can move the carriage by hand.
action.cancelconfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the current job?
action.autocolortitle: Pick the closest match for existing colors in the drawing. Click again to UNDO.

libs.ignorewash: Full wash command ignored for draw mode __mode__
libs.inked: There is now __media__ on the brush
libs.reinkingdry: Going to get some more __media__, no water...

manual.info: Motors unlocked for calibration, use the toggle button find the correct draw height, ensure the pen is put back in park position, then click continue to resume drawing.

cancel.title: Cancel Print [Escape]
cancel.info: Cancel the current print job, close the mode and return to the home screen.

continue.title: Continue with __color__ [Enter]
continue.info: Once you've finished changing to the correct drawing implement, click to continue drawing.

toggle.title: Toggle height [Space]
toggle.info: Toggle the raising/lowering of the pen to calibrate its height.

external.title: External Server
external.address: Enter the address and port to connect to:

status.error: Connection failed. Check that your port/domain is correct and that this computer is connected to the same network.

status.wait: Please wait while executed processes complete...
status.unlocked: Motors unlocked! Place in home corner when done
status.question: What do you want to do?

modeproblem.loaddetail: Something went wrong when loading that mode, see the debug console for details.

delete.message: Delete this file from your history?
delete.detail: The SVG cache file will be removed from this list and from your computer, this cannot be undone.

intro.detail: Before you can start making art, you must ensure your drawing tool is the right position above your drawing surface.
intro.instruction: Make sure your robot's holder is empty, then click the button to begin calibration.

unlock.detail: The carriage has been moved to the top left of the drawing area, the motors have been unlocked, and the tool holder is in the lowest position.
unlock.instruction: Once ready, insert your tool to its lowest expected position and tighten it completely, then click next.

finish.detail: The tool should now be up and above any obstacles or the drawing surface. If not, you may need to adjust the height in advanced settings.
finish.instruction: You're done! Move the carriage by hand to the parking position and you can start making art.

reset.title: Reset
reset.confirm: Reset all settings to factory defaults?

stroke.enableinfo: Allow robopaint to trace along paths and outlines automatically.
stroke.fillinfo: If enabled, an outline of the same color will be added for filled paths without a stroke.
stroke.invisibleinfo: If enabled, strokes will be added to all existing paths regardless of stroke width or color.
stroke.closefilledinfo: If enabled, unclosed filled paths will be outlined fully as if they were closed.
stroke.occlusionallinfo: If disabled, all outlines / stroke tracing will ignore path overlap and layer order. Stroke Precision value above will improve the precision of overlap detection.
stroke.occfillsinfo: If disabled, all outlines / stroke tracing will ignore filled color overlaps.
stroke.occstrokeinfo: If disabled, all outlines / stroke tracing will ignore stroke overlaps.
stroke.occcolorinfo: If enabled, all outlines / stroke tracing of the same collor as an overlapping fill or stroke will ignore occlusion.
stroke.occtrans: Ignore occlusion under transparent fill or stroke
stroke.occtransinfo: If enabled, all outlines / stroke tracing under transparent paths will ignore occlusion.

fill.enableinfo: If disabled, no fills will be traced in any automatic mode functionality.

group.title: Grouping Threshold:
group.info: Minimum threshold for grouping hatch line endings together into connected groups. Large value connects more groups with fewer tool lifts, 0 will ensure no groups are made.

fill.hatchinfo: If enabled, a secondary 90° opposite angle fill will be added for each path.
fill.randominfo: If enabled, each object will be filled with paths at a random angle, instead of the above value.
fill.insetinfo: The amount that the rendered fill path should pull away from the edge of the fill shape border. Applies to all fill types.
fill.precisioninfo: Primarily for spiral fill, this setting is also used for converting the zig-smooth into a polygonal line post processing.
fill.align: Align spiral fill to each path
fill.aligninfo: If enabled (spiral fill type only), the fill spiral will be centered on the fill path. If disabled, the spiral will align to the center of the canvas for every path.
fill.occinfo: If disabled, all fill tracing will ignore filled color overlaps.

trace.title: Trace Speed:
trace.info: The amount of work done for each frame. Higher iteration count should take less time overall, but update less often.

width.title: Preview line width:
width.info: How large traced paths will appear in the live preview. Does not effect printing.

output.skipwhiteinfo: When your media settings (paint colors) contain white, ignore any paths that would be painted in that color. You may want to turn this off when painting on a background that is not white.
output.optimizeinfo: If enabled, all automatic painting paths (fill and stroke) will be reordered according to color and proximity to previous path end. Paths will even be reversed to ensure lowest distance between work, but can take a very strange path if working with multiple lines of text.

move.title: Carriage Movement Speed:
move.hint: Move left for slower, right for faster.

penmode.title: Printing Mode:
penmode.warningPaint: Paint required. Printing Mode incompatible with this setting.
penmode.warningAll: Water/Paint required. Printing Mode incompatible with this setting.

showcolortext.title: Show color names
showcolortext.detail: When enabled, color names will display on the paint palette for print colors, otherwise they will only be visible on hover.

maxpaintdistance.title: Refill Distance:
maxpaintdistance.hint: Move left to get paint more often, right to get paint less often.
maxpaintdistance.detail: The distance for the brush to paint on the paper before it should go get more water/paint on the brush. Default is **48.2cm / 19in**.

refillmode.title: Refill Mode:
refillmode.detail: Choose to refill the paint either after a certain distance (default), or after each SVG path.

refillaction.title: Refill Action:
refillaction.opt1: Single dip in water and paint
refillaction.opt2: Double dip in water and paint
refillaction.detail: When refilling paint, get a lot of paint (default) or just dip in the paint either once or twice.

strokeprecision.title: Stroke Precision:
strokeprecision.detail: How accurately outlines are re-traced to be printed. Smaller precision value = more detail, but more processing/printing time.

strokeovershoot.title: Stroke Overshoot:
strokeovershoot.detail: The distance factor to move the brush beyond when lifting to make up for brush bend. Default is **5mm**.

servo.title: Brush-lift (servo) Motor
servo.timedetails: Amount of time (in milliseconds) we should wait for a movement through the full up/down range. **Default is 340**, set to 0 to not wait at all. Smaller movements will take a proportionately smaller amount of time.

steppers.title: X/Y Steppers
steppers.invertdetail: In case one of your motors moves backwards.

buffer.title: Buffer Smoothing:
buffer.detail: Removes time from API callback duration, forces buffering and smoothing out subsequent position calls. Default is **20 ms**. Negative values add extra delay. Only increase if printing is jittery.
buffer.hover: Move right for more offset (smooth), left for negative offset (jerky)

steppers.swapdetail: In case you've accidentally wired up Motor 1 where Motor 2 is supposed to go.

advanced.debugdetail: If enabled, extra features for developers like devtools will be opened automatically for the main window, and for modes marked with debug true.

modes.title: Modes
modes.detail: Enable or disable experimental RoboPaint modes

bottype.title: Type of printing bot connected:
bottype.detail: RoboPaint was made for the WaterColorBot, but because it's based on CNC Server it can talk to any bot that it supports! **Change requires App restart.**
bottype.warning: Selected bot incompatible with printing tools.

api.title: API Server
api.detail: When running supported apps, this would be the server IP and port to enter into the app. **Change requires App restart.**

httplocalonly.title: Only allow connections from this computer:
httplocalonly.detail: Uncheck this to connect to the CNCServer API in RoboPaint from other devices. **Change requires App restart.**
